import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    div = n // 3
    print(div if n % 3 == 0 else div + 1)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# get the number of students
N = int(input())

# the number of groups consisting of three or more students is equal to the integer division of the number of students by 3.
print(N // 3)
